channel.title: MoparScape Questions!
channel.description: Hello. I am new here , but I want to normal play Moparscape.. 1rd. Question.. When you Logg in your all stats are 99 ? 2rd. Can I do All my stats Level 1 ? 3rd. How Can I get items? Because Then I write ::pickup 560 ect. I don't gain anything... 4rd. Why in the game is SO MORE BUGGS? Because I can't even climp up stairs...... 5rd. Where's the best monster where I can kill them ?... Thanks , I hope someone will answer. : :)

item.description:
@weeds wrote:

well if you can’t do them things im guessing you have made yourself mod or admin on it and with 127.0.0.1 if your admin or mod on it you can’t pickup or do stuff unless it is your server but cos its 127.0.0.1 you can’t edit the java files
there for it won’t work

item.title: MoparScape Questions!
item.dc:creator: @Kostaw Kostaw
item.description:
@Kostaw wrote:

Rog3r. My stats are All 99 … But I want them All level 1. How to do that? My “character-rights = 3”

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape Questions!
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

It’s in the right section and if you aren’t picking up things, or your stats are not 99, go into the characters folder and pick the file you want to edit.

Rights: Change “playerRights” to 3 (not 0)
Stats: In stats section after each name, change the numbers (last set are EXP)

Read full topic

item.description:
@Whysoserious wrote:

um… its 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, etc… and if you want to just do the 127.0.0.1 im telling you theres no point to it. and to fight monsters in it you have to do commands like ::npc 2745 (jad).

EDIT:
Wrong section too
